update.description:
This fixes a compile error when building against sdformat default. The variant does not contain `gazebo::common::Color`, so a `Param::Get()` cannot succeed.

Since `gazebo::common::Color` is deprecated this PR also deprecates and adds alternatives to some methods that use `common::Color` in their signature. It doesn't replace all uses of `common::Color`, just enough to get the build complete plus a tiny bit more so that `common::Color` functions are deprecated in the files that had compile errors.
update.title: Fix compile error due gazebo::common::Color and sdformat

It doesn't replace all uses of `common::Color`, just enough to get the build complete plus a tiny bit more so that `common::Color` functions are deprecated in the files that had compile errors.

pullrequest.title: Fix compile error due gazebo::common::Color and sdformat

content.raw:
I think this is ready to be merged. While the builds are all unstable, there are no new test failures/cppcheck issues/compiler warnings.

1.  [gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia 310](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/310)
    1. 4/5 failures are also in [build 303](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/303/) which is a different branch
    1. UNIT_IntrospectionCurveHandler_TEST is known to be flaky #2121
1. [gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none 644](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/644/)
    1. No test failures
    1. unstable to due existing cppcheck warnings not introduced by this PR
1. [gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64 1218](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1218)
    1. Every test failure is also in [build 1211](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1211/) which is a different branch
1. [gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64 1895](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1895)
    1. The mountain of compiler warnings are all in [build 1887](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/1887/) which is a different branch
content.html:
I think this is ready to be merged. While the builds are all unstable, there are no new test failures/cppcheck issues/compiler warnings.

  1. gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia 310
    1. 4/5 failures are also in build 303 which is a different branch
    2. UNIT_IntrospectionCurveHandler_TEST is known to be flaky #2121
  2. gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none 644
    1. No test failures
    2. unstable to due existing cppcheck warnings not introduced by this PR
  3. gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64 1218
    1. Every test failure is also in build 1211 which is a different branch
  4. gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64 1895
    1. The mountain of compiler warnings are all in build 1887 which is a different branch

pullrequest.title: Fix compile error due gazebo::common::Color and sdformat

content.raw: Ouch. They're all `deprecated-declarations`. Fixing these means one of: not deprecating any methods in this PR, expanding this PR to replace/deprecate all usage of gazebo::Color with ignition::math::Color, or updating just the code which calls one of the methods here to ignition::math::Color. I'll start on option3 since it is a part of option 2.
content.html: Ouch. They're all deprecated-declarations. Fixing these means one of: not deprecating any methods in this PR, expanding this PR to replace/deprecate all usage of gazebo::Color with ignition::math::Color, or updating just the code which calls one of the methods here to ignition::math::Color. I'll start on option3 since it is a part of option 2.

content.raw: Thanks for tackling this! It would be great to actually deprecate `gazebo::common::Color` before the Gazebo 9 release, so we can remove it on Gazebo 10.
content.html: Thanks for tackling this! It would be great to actually deprecate gazebo::common::Color before the Gazebo 9 release, so we can remove it on Gazebo 10.
